ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch Message
ygData.msgSnippet: all I can say is (excuse my language) what a fucking joke. 10 points per level above level 45? Well damn, I do an extra 100 hp of damage with DDD, it s still a
ygData.messageBody:
all I can say is (excuse my language) what a fucking joke. 10 points per
level above level 45? Well damn, I do an extra 100 hp of damage with DDD,
it's still a complete and utter waste of a spell slot. I'm really going to
spend all my mana on 400 points of damage.

I'm so disappointed it hurts. Why bother trying to "balance" the classes if
you're going to fall so short.

Draelon Stormsong

-----Original Message-----
From: Matt DeBarger [mailto:mattdeba@...]
Sent: Wednesday, February 21, 2001 10:28 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Patch Message


As I read it, the heal change won't affect us. It seemed that high end
heals (better than greater heal) essentially had the taunt factor of greater
heal. My secondary is a cleric, and I can definitly say that superior was
no where near the mega taunt I thought it would be. Fortunatly for my
cleric, he is lvl 37 so the change wont affect him for a long time.
HOWEVER, for high clerics this could be devastating. Can you imagine how
hard dragons are going to be now? Main tank group, the cleric essentially
has to start healing after about 10 seconds. He is going to agro that
dragon pretty damn quick, good bye mr cleric, good bye main tank group...

Who requested DDD be improved? Liek anyone is going to use it now that it
does a few more points of damage...

with the subject submissions.
